TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void BuildStatusEventHandler(object sender, BuildStatusEventArgs e);
.class public auto ansi sealed BuildStatusEventHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate

Docs.param: A <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.Framework.BuildStatusEventArgs"> that contains the event data.
Docs.summary: Represents the method that will handle the <see cref="E:Microsoft.Build.Framework.IEventSource.StatusEventRaised"> event of a build.
